my:Hazard.my:ControlMeasures: a) Use of suitable and appropriate PPE: overalls, safety shoes, hard hat, gloves, lifejackets, etc.; b) The rescue boat crew must remain seated, keeping limbs inside the rescue boat during launch / recovery at all times.
Maintenance and inspections to be carried out in accordance with the Manufacturer's Manual and Company MPM system.
Particular attention should be made to the safe working load of the rescue boat / davit during launch / recovery.

my:Hazard.my:Description: Equipment failure i.e. lifting wires, hooks

my:Hazard.my:ControlMeasures: Smoking is not permitted during the launch / recovery of the rescue boat.
